attributes.action: Allow the members of the Air Training Corps to practise and carry out drill with weapons, in their compounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is aimed at both members and past members of the ATC who do/didn't have the direct opportunity to pratice drill with lead filled rifles.  

This is important as it gives cadets a head start for when they join the armed forces and they are forced to participate in such movements.
